content: Happy Anniversary! The Dow Jones Industrial Average reached 10,000 for the first time in history! Oh wait a minute..... You mean to tell me.... You aren't serious are you....? This happened WHEN?! Back on MARCH 30, 1999?! TEN YEARS AGO??!! Doh!
reply: Happy Anniversary! The Dow Jones Industrial Average reached 10,000 for the first time in history! Oh wait a minute..... You mean to tell me.... You aren't serious are you....? This happened WHEN?! Back on MARCH 30, 1999?! TEN YEARS AGO??!! Doh!
title: Wall Street Celebrates Major Milestone

content: Hey, where is everyone? How come y'all ain't celebrating with me? It's March 30, 2009! You know, the 10th Anniversary of the Dow Jones Industrial Average reaching 10,000 for the first time! Man, remember the euphoria when the Dow hit 10,000 back in March 1999? Investors were partying well into the night (and the next morning). Good times. Where does the Dow stand now? Well... It's ahh.. Er... Um.. 7,522 Hey, look, an elephant riding a tricycle!

content: quote: Originally posted by SUNLINER81: Your point to all of this is?... Respectfully, SUNLINER81 "...if a blind man leads a blind man, both will fall into the pit." "...who built his house on sand. The rain came down, the streams rose, and the winds blew and beat against that house, and it fell with a great crash." (Jesus of Nazareth) "Insanity: Doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results." (Albert Einstein) "Fat, drunk and stupid is no way to go through life, son." (Dean Wormer - Faber College)
